-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

comment: Convergence to zero of the absolute value is equivalent to convergence to zero. (Contributed by NM, 8-Jul-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
